participant_2.background:
I love going to Comic Con because it's a place where I can be myself and express my creativity.
i wish i could live in iceland.
I met the creators of my favorite comic book series at a comic con in Russia.
i have a dog.
I wake up and put on my favorite name band shirt before heading out to the skatepark.

content.text: Hey! I love comic cons too, it's where I can be myself and express my creativity. What's your favorite thing about it?
I love meeting creators and artists, I also love the cosplay! Where do you go to comic con?
I have been to the one in Chicago and the one in New York City. I have a friend who went to one in Russia.
Wow, the one in Russia sounds amazing! I wish I could go to that one. I live in California and we have a few here.
California seems like a cool place, I've always wanted to go. I love the music scene there, especially the punk scene.
Yeah, it's a great place! I love punk rock too, it's my favorite music genre. I have a dog and I like to take him to the skatepark with me.
That's awesome! I love dogs. Do you have a picture of him? I love going to the skatepark too.
Sure, here's a picture of him. I wish I could skate but I'm too uncoordinated.
Awh, he's so cute! I love his name. I can't skate either, I'm too worried about falling and hurting myself
